messages.title: Only the Lib Dems can stop a hard Brexit
messages.content: "Only the Lib Dems can stop a hard Brexit" - The Times, 4th April 2017

messages.title: Lib Dems to oppose second independence referendum
messages.content: "Lib Dems to oppose second independence referendum" - The Herald, 6th September 2016
"The Liberal Democrats could be the big winners." - The Times, 21st March 2017
"Local poll results 'real springboard' for Scottish Lib Dems" - The Herald, 6th May 2017
Mr Rennie said his party had been "strongest" in areas where it is targeting the SNP in the June 8 General Election. - The Herald, 6th May 2017

messages.title: Scotland has lost out
messages.content: Scotland has lost out because the SNP have been distracted by independence

messages.title: The choice in this election is clear
messages.content: ONLY ONE PARTY CAN STOP THE SNP

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Scottish Liberal Democrats will stop another divisive independence referendum.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Oppose the Conservative's damaging hard Brexit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Scottish Liberal Democrats will oppose the Conservative's damaging hard Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Invest in education and mental health
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Scottish Liberal Democrats will invest in education and mental health.
